name: JS Strategic Advisory Services
goal:
JS Strategic Advisory Services advises organizations on EU and global political and regulatory risks.
JSAS advises reputation sensitive sectors on EU engagement strategy and advocacy campaign.
In particular, JSAS works on policy areas covering Energy, Trade, Migration and Security.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Competition, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Migration and asylum, Trade
euInitiatives:
Main issues followed
- FTA negotiations and implementation (CETA, MERCOSUR)
- Trade Policy, Trade Defence Instrument ; Generalised Systems of Preferences
- Migration and Border Management
- Security
- Blockchain
- Raw Materials agenda
customers: National Confederation of Industry (CNI),Garment Manufacturers Association of Cambodia (GMAC)
